name: Wrecking Adventure
description:
Your boat ran aground on an island andyou're forced to repair it by picking up stuff. Be carreful, the  indigenous don't like strangers.

controls : ZSQD : movements, F : pick up / repair.

                      Xbox controller.

Global Game Jam 2020, theme : REPAIR.

Dev : Romain Saclier , Lazlo Barragan , Esteban Legrand

Graph : Tristan Greco ,Musslin Lola , Emmanuel Barbaut

Sound designer : Maxime Corso , Joan Nauroy

Music : Maxime Corso

Amaury Dangréau Emmanuel Barbaut ( GD, VFX, Script, Juce)
